We_give: We give struks a place to experience.
We_created: We've created a networking platform where struks and strkaters companies may interact directly, and both can benefit from this website by choosing the best ter / hambal for them. We make your job easier.
Volunteer_text: If you want to help others and are a skilled individual then go ahead and join to our volunteers’ group.
Company_text: If you require assistance or wish to plan an event, then click here and find your volunteers from our platform.
Tasks: See what tasks are currently available
Basic_package: This package is perfect for testing all our features and inviting up to 10 volunteers to your event.
Pro_package: This package is perfect for hosting medium-sized events and inviting up to 20 volunteers to your event.
Business_package: This package is perfect for organizing Large-scale events and inviting up to 30 volunteers to your event.
